name: Alterations 101 - September
description:
Learn the basics of alterations, including tips and tricks from Moni, owner of Sew Moni. You'll get to alter 3 of your own pieces and walk away with lasting sewing skills.

Skill Level: Must take Beginning Sewing prior to class or have equivalent machine sewing experience

Address:
330 South 3rd St.
Brooklyn, NY 11237

Details:
$320.00
(includes use of machines and some supplies)
2 seats available per class
4 week class

To register, please choose your course schedule option below and submit payment online or call  917-450-8203  to register in person.

September Schedule:

Sundays 4pm to 6pm

name: The Denim Shirt - September
description:

name: The Perfect Jean - September
description:
You can never go wrong with a pair of custom fit jeans? Learn to make your own pair from the ground up in just five weeks. You'll take a basic pattern and make it your own by choosing everything from fit, pocket size, thread, and fabric. 

Skill Level: Must take Beginning Dress Construction prior to class or have equivalent machine sewing experience

Address: 
330 South 3rd St. 
Brooklyn, NY 11237

Details: 
$325.00
(includes use of machines and some supplies) 
3 seats available per class 
3/4 week class

September:

Sundays 15,22,29
1:30pm to 3:30pm

name: Beginning Sewing - September
description:
Learn to sew with us in a fun, no pressure environment in Williamsburg. Start with the basics of sewing by learning machine functions and trouble shooting. Over the course of 3 weeks, students will construct a reversible tote bag and learn cutting, pinning, simple pattern making, and machine sewing.

New Scheduling:
Our regular 4-Week (1.5 hr) classes have been consolidated to 3-week (2 hr) classes.

Skill Level:
No previous experience required.

Address:
330 S. 3rd Street
Williamsburg Brooklyn 11211

Details:
$220
(includes use of machines and tools)
4 seats available per class
3 week class

name: Beginning Dress - September
description:
Apply basic knowledge of machine sewing to make a fitted sleeveless dress. Learn to read patterns, insert a zipper, and simple tailoring methods. This course is great for those that want to sew their own clothing using store bought sewing patterns.

New Scheduling:
Our regular 4-Week (1.5 hr) classes have been consolidated to 3-week (2 hr) classes.

Skill Level:
Must take Beginning Sewing prior to class or have equivalent machine sewing experience.

name: Children's Clothing - September
description:
Make your little one the most stylish on the block with some handmade frocks! Over the course of 3 weeks, students will create a pair of elastic waist jeans with pockets and a jersey knit tee. Learn how to read patterns, basic seam finishing techniques, and how to add design accents like patch pockets and trims.

New Scheduling:
Our regular 4-Week (1.5 hr) classes have been consolidated to 3-week (2 hr) classes.

name: Serrated Tracing Wheel
description:
This serrated tracing wheel is a great tool to help transfer patterns from paper to fabric.  The serrated edges make a clean dotted line, even on bulky fabrics and through multiple layers. 

Specifications:
Manufactured by Dritz

name: Wax-Free Tracing Paper
description:
Use this wax-free tracing paper to transfer pattern markings and needlepoint designs.  Marks easily removable with fabric eraser, brush, or damp cloth.  Package includes assorted colors for use on all fabrics. 

Specifications:
5 sheets (white, yellow, orange, red, blue)
5 1/8" x 19 1/2" (13cm x 49.5cm)
Manufactured by Dritz

name: Quilting Betweens
description:
Finer needles for detail work on hand quilting. 

Specifications:
20 count
Size 3/9
Manufactured by Dritz

name: Denim/Jeans Needles
description:
Everyone has that favorite pair of jeans.  You know, the ones that are impossible to replace?  Well, when yours need some patching up, these denim specific machine needles will come to your rescue.

Specifications:
3 count
Size 16 
Manufactured by Dritz

name: Tracing Wheel + Wax Free Tracing Paper (Set)
description:
Make transferring patterns a breeze with this tracing paper and tracing wheel set.  Use the serrated tracing wheel to to easily make dotted markings on fabric. The wax-free tracing paper comes in multiple colors for use on all fabrics, and the marks are easy to remove with a fabric eraser, brush, or damp cloth.

Specifications:
Serrated Tracing Wheel:
Manufactured by Dritz

Wax-Free Tracing Paper:
5 sheets (white, yellow, orange, red, blue)
5 1/8" x 19 1/2" (13cm x 49.5cm)

name: Tapestry Needles

Machine Wash Cold and Tumble Dry Low
Handmade in the USA

name: Green Glass Beehive Jug
description:
This beautiful green glass jug would make a perfect addition to any fireplace mantel, windowsill, bookcase, or center-piece. The color and shape is quite intriguing and catches the light in a beautiful way.

Height: 6 1/2 inches
Width: 4 1/2 inches
Jar Opening Width:1 1/4 inches
Wire Handle Height: 3 3/4 inches
Hand Wash in Warm Soapy Water

name: Harlequin Glasses
description:
These red and gold, 1960s style glasses are fun and just right for mixed drinks.  Use them for everyday drinking glasses or let them dazzle your dinner party guests.

Set of 2 Glasses
Height: 5 1/2 inches
Width: 2 3/4 inches
Hand wash in warm soapy water to prevent color loss and damage on embossed graphic.

name: Amber Lace Platter
description:
This beautiful amber glass serving platter would make a great addition to any table set. Perfect for dinner party fruit and cheese hors d'oeuvres!

1 Platter
10 inch Diameter
Hand Wash in Warm Soapy Water

name: Glass Lace Plates
description:
These glass lace plates are a great addition to any place setting. They are perfect for h'ordevours or desserts and add a nice sparkle to any dinner party.

Set of 3 Plates
Diameter: 6 3/4 inches
Hand Wash in Warm Soapy Water

name: Glass Tea Cup & Saucer
description:
This adorable set is perfect for those relaxing afternoons.  Make some of your favorite tea or pour in some lemonade and enjoy your afternoon drink!

Set of 1 Glass & 1 Saucer
Cup Height: 2 1/4 inches
Cup Rim Width: 3 1/2 inches
Hand Wash in Warm Soapy Water

name: Gold New Hampshire Mini Tray
description:
This eccentric, gray glass, ash tray makes a perfect catch-all for jewelry, loose change, or extra change. This traveler's souvenir piece is gilded with the inscription "New Hampshire" "Old Man of the Mountains" and a graphic of a mountainside. 

Height: 6 3/4 inches
Width: 5 inches
Hand Wash in Warm Soapy Water

name: Criss-Cross Apron Pattern
description:
Sew up your very own SEW Moni reversible apron and get down to cooking! The pattern includes an easy to read apron pattern along with illustrated instructions, perfect for beginning sewers. 

Pattern fits most adults S/M/L

Materials Needed:
1 Yard Fabric for Apron Front, Pocket, Straps
1 Yard Fabric for Apron Lining
Coordinating Thread
Scissors
Straight pins
Iron     
Ironing Surface
Sewing Machine

name: Brooklynite Cosmetic Bag Pattern
description:
Create your very own SEW Moni cosmetic bag. Whether using it for a make-up carrier, a chic clutch, or to hold your sewing supplies, we think it's a must! The pattern is perfect for any beginners and includes an easy to read pattern along with illustrated instructions.

Materials Needed:
1/4 Yard Fabric for Exterior
1/4 Yard Fabric for Lining
9 Jean Zipper
Coordinating Thread
Scissors
Straight pins
Iron
Ironing Surface
Sewing Machine
Zipper Foot

name: Ft. Greene Tote Bag Pattern
description:
This reversible tote bag pattern is a perfect sewing project for a beginner with its illustrated instructions and easy to read patterns. Sew up one of these Ft. Greene totes and use it for toting groceries to and fro, or toss some snacks in and head to the park! 

Materials Needed:
1/2 Yard Fabric for Tote Exterior and Straps
1/2 Yard Fabric for Tote Lining and Inner Pocket
Coordinating Thread
Scissors
Straight pins
Ruler Marking     
Chalk/Pencil
Iron     
Ironing Surface
Sewing Machine
